pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyze (Fuzzy) Time Series // Analyze (fuzzy) time series, calculate AIC value of common time series models and propose the best model. Fuzzy time series can be analyzed by "Chen", "Sing", "Heuristic" and "Chen-Hsu" models. The Abbasov-Mamedova model and an improved version of the Abbasov-Mamedova model is included as well.
